page.title: 17Local events(2)in Leverton
page.content: This year's show was almost ruined by the weather as at 12-30pm just as the show was opening the heavens opened and we were drenched by a violent thunderstorm which deposited one third of an inch(8mm) of rain in half an hour.Fortunately the field in which the show was held is very well drained and the sun eventually shone.Those who attended enjoyed the afternoon's events and a profit was made which will benefit the funds of the Village Hall.Preparations will soon be in hand for next year's show.
